https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/akbbDgV5L4h5k0zQ9Nk3n6bfoTi.jpg A seemingly simple taxi ride across Paris evolves into a profound meditation on the realities of the driver, whose personal life is in shambles, and his fare, an elderly woman whose warmth belies her shocking past. Driving Madeleine
